name: So Epic Game 3d
description:
This game is a crappy 3d endless runner game where you have to avoid the obstacles by jumping. That's all of this game!

How to Play/Controls

A and D to move left and right

Space to jump

Esc to pause game.

Made in 1 hour and 10 minutes

This game is made in 10 hours and 10 minutes for exporting and some fixing stuff...That's why its crappy!!!!

System Requirements

Must have a pc, But will run on your toaster and even your microwave oven!!!
